content: {"name": "Urban Mission, food pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "", "email": "", "url": "https://www.urbanmission.org/need-help/food/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "311 North 6th Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Steubenville", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43952", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.3645749, "longitude": -80.6158928}, "phones": [{"number": "(740) 282-2911", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
